audit_queue_length.help: Current number of entries in the audit queue

labels.help: Encrypted data type (config, logs, audit, bucket_<bucket_name>)

labels.help: Data encryption key (DEK) type (configDek, logDek, auditDek, bucketDek_<bucket_name>)

cm_encr_at_rest_drop_deks_events_total.help: Total number drop DEKs events (when some DEK expires and the system tries to stop using that DEK by re-encrypting data)

labels.help: Data encryption key (DEK) type (configDek, logDek, auditDek, bucketDek_<bucket_name>)

cm_encr_at_rest_generate_dek_failures_to.help: Total number of data key generation failures

labels.name: type
labels.help: Data encryption key (DEK) type (configDek, logDek, auditDek, bucketDek_<bucket_name>)

cm_encr_at_rest_generate_dek_total.help: Total number of successful data key generation events

labels.name: type
labels.help: Data encryption key (DEK) type (configDek, logDek, auditDek, bucketDek_<bucket_name>)

cm_encryption_key_rotation_failures_tota.help: Total number of encryption key rotation failures

cm_index_pausing_runs_total.help: Number of times indexing was paused on old master node

cm_rebalance_in_progress.help: Indicates if a rebalance is running (1 = true, 0 = false). Only reported by the orchestrator node.

cm_rebalance_stuck.help: Boolean indicator of whether the rebalance appears stuck (not making progress)

labels.help: Service that the progress is for

cm_request_unhibernates_total.help: Number of times requests were unhibernated

sys_cpu_burst_rate.help: Rate at which CPUs overran their quota
sys_cpu_burst_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_cgroup_seconds_total.help: Number of CPU seconds utilized in the cgroup, by mode

labels.name: mode
labels.help: type of usage (user, sys, throttled, burst)

sys_cpu_cgroup_usage_seconds_total.help: Number of 'user' and 'system' CPU seconds utilized in the cgroup

sys_cpu_cores_available.help: Number of available CPU cores in the control group

sys_cpu_host_cores_available.help: Number of available CPU cores in the host

sys_cpu_host_idle_rate.help: Idle CPU utilization rate in the host
sys_cpu_host_idle_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_host_other_rate.help: Other (not idle/user/sys/irq/stolen) CPU utilization rate in the host
sys_cpu_host_other_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_host_seconds_total.help: Number of CPU seconds utilized in the host, by mode

labels.name: mode
labels.help: type of usage (idle, iowait, user, sys, irq, stolen, other)

sys_cpu_host_sys_rate.help: System CPU utilization rate in the host
sys_cpu_host_sys_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_host_user_rate.help: User space CPU utilization rate in the host
sys_cpu_host_user_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_host_utilization_rate.help: CPU utilization rate in the host
sys_cpu_host_utilization_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_irq_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_stolen_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_sys_rate.help: System CPU utilization rate in the control group
sys_cpu_sys_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_throttled_rate.help: Rate at which CPUs were throttled
sys_cpu_throttled_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_user_rate.help: User space CPU utilization rate in the control group
sys_cpu_user_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_cpu_utilization_rate.help: CPU utilization rate in the control group
sys_cpu_utilization_rate.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release

sys_disk_queue.help: Current disk queue length of the disk

sys_disk_queue_depth.help: Maximum disk queue length of the disk

sys_disk_read_bytes.help: Number of bytes read by the disk

sys_disk_read_time_seconds.help: Amount of time that the disk spent reading

sys_disk_reads.help: Number of reads that the disk performed

sys_disk_time_seconds.help: Amount of time that the disk spent performing IO

sys_disk_usage_ratio.help: Total usage % of a disk or partition

sys_disk_write_bytes.help: Number of bytes written by the disk

sys_disk_write_time_seconds.help: Amount of time that the disk spent writing

sys_disk_writes.help: Number of writes that the disk performed

sys_mem_actual_free.help: Amount of system memory available, including buffers/cache

sys_mem_actual_used.help: Amount of system memory used, excluding buffers/cache

sys_mem_cgroup_actual_used.help: Amount of system memory used, excluding buffers/cache, in the control group

sys_mem_cgroup_limit.help: System memory limit, in the control group

sys_mem_cgroup_used.help: Amount of system memory used, including buffers/cache, in the control group

sys_mem_free.help: Amount of system memory free, excluding buffers/cache

sys_mem_limit.notes: Will be removed in the 8.0 release. Use sys_mem_total or sys_mem_cgroup_limit

sys_mem_used_sys.help: Amount of system memory used, including buffers/cache

sys_pressure_share_time_stalled.help: Percentage of time that tasks were stalled on a given resource

labels.name: level
labels.help: Level at which statistics are tracked (host|cgroup)

labels.name: quantifier
labels.help: Quantifies how many tasks were stalled (some|all)

labels.name: interval
labels.help: Time interval (in seconds) over which the stat was averaged (10|60|300)

sys_pressure_total_stall_time_usec.help: Absolute stall time when tasks were stalled on a given resource

labels.name: level
labels.help: Level at which statistics are tracked (host|cgroup)

labels.name: quantifier
labels.help: Quantifies how many tasks were stalled (some|all)

labels.help: Name of the process (e.g. babysitter, bash, etc.)
